Requirement Description: The website should allow a new user to create an account with valid details
Test Case Name: Verify user can register with valid details

Requirement Description: The system should show an error when the email field is left empty during registration
Test Case Name: Verify error message when email field is left empty

Requirement Description: The system should not allow registration with an email that is already registered
Test Case Name: Verify error message when registering with an already existing email

Requirement Description: The password field should hide the characters typed by the user
Test Case Name: Verify password field does not show characters in plain text

Requirement Description: The user must agree to the Privacy Policy before completing registration
Test Case Name: Verify user cannot register without agreeing to Privacy Policy

Requirement Description: A registered user should be able to log in with correct email and password
Test Case Name: Verify user can login with valid credentials

Requirement Description: The system should show an error when the wrong password is entered
Test Case Name: Verify error message when wrong password is entered

Requirement Description: The system should show an error when login is attempted with empty fields
Test Case Name: Verify error when both email and password fields are empty

Requirement Description: A user who forgot their password should be able to request a reset link
Test Case Name: Verify Forgotten Password link is visible and clickable

Requirement Description: A logged-in user should be able to log out of their account
Test Case Name: Verify user can log out successfully

Requirement Description: The search bar should return matching products when a valid name is entered
Test Case Name: Verify search returns results for a valid product name

Requirement Description: The search should show a no results message when no product matches the search term
Test Case Name: Verify search with a product name that does not exist

Requirement Description: Submitting the search bar empty should not cause a site error
Test Case Name: Verify search bar works when left empty and submitted

Requirement Description: A user should be able to add a product to the shopping cart from the product page
Test Case Name: Verify user can add a product to cart from the product page

Requirement Description: The cart icon should update to show the correct number of items after adding a product
Test Case Name: Verify cart icon shows the correct number of items

Requirement Description: A user should be able to remove items from the shopping cart
Test Case Name: Verify user can remove a product from the cart

Requirement Description: A user should be able to change the quantity of a product in the cart and see the updated total
Test Case Name: Verify user can update product quantity in the cart

Requirement Description: A logged-in user should be able to add products to their wishlist
Test Case Name: Verify logged-in user can add a product to wishlist

Requirement Description: A guest user should be redirected to login when trying to use the wishlist
Test Case Name: Verify a guest user cannot add to wishlist

Requirement Description: A user should be able to submit the Contact Us form with valid details
Test Case Name: Verify Contact Us form submits successfully with all valid inputs
